roleset.name: to refrain from or deduct, holding back

example.name: withhold-v: all arguments
example.text: Prices closed mostly higher in relatively light trading as farmers continued [*] to withhold their crops from the marketplace in the hope of higher prices [*0*] [*T*-2] to come .
example.arg: in the hope of higher prices

example.name: withholding-n: arg1
example.text: The option as voluntary will at least not require quotas and enforcement through violent means -LRB- beatings -RRB- or witholding of priveledges like food , bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight and isolation . -LRB- legislativ brutality encouragement -RRB-
example.arg: priveledges like food , bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight

roleset.note: WITHHOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'withhold' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from withhold.01-v predicate notes)
WITHHOLDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, withhold.01. No VNcls. (from withholding.01-n)
